attributes.action: Museums etc not free to foreign tourists
attributes.additional_details: The countries I visit don't have free museums and galleries to foreign visitors, so I don't see why our fantastic ones in London should be free to foreign tourists.  If they've travelled all the way to London if they really want to enter a museum or gallery I am sure they wouldn't object to paying a small sum when they would have to in other countries.  Even more revenue would be generated if you charge nationals too, but that does go against the ideology that our culture should be for all (of us nationals) and not just those that can afford it.
